ygData.subject: Re: Shadowstep-Gate Success Stories??
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm, probably, but not sure if this explains why my distance is quite good when I m testing it -vs- when I need it in battle. Draco, 14th Lvl Wizard ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm, probably, but not sure if this explains why my distance is quite good
when I'm testing it -vs- when I need it in battle.

Draco, 14th Lvl Wizard

-----Original Message-----
From: McGraw, T. David [mailto:Mcgraw.Thomas@...]
Sent: Friday, April 23, 1999 11:07 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Shadowstep-Gate Success
Stories??

From: "McGraw, T. David" <Mcgraw.Thomas@...>

My shadowstep distance has increased proportional to my
Alteration skill.
Now that my skill is maxed I rarely get a short distance
teleport. I have
been known to jump halfway across the zone when I cast it,
which gives
plenty of time to gate.

Yours,

~Aereuss Ravins of Tarew Marr
